entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this morning. Showers beginning near noon. Risk of thundershowers this afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 8 May 2023
